column2: SilverCrest Metals, Inc. engages in the exploration, acquisition, and development of mineral properties and precious metals. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia. The firm is engaged in acquisition and exploration of mineral property interests in Mexico. The firm's projects include Las Chispas Property and Cruz de Mayo Property. The Las Chispas Property in Sonora, Mexico consists of 28 concessions totaling approximately 1,400 hectares. Cruz de Mayo Property is also located in Sonora State, Mexico. The Companyâ€™s other Mexican exploration properties include Guadalupe, Angel de Plata and Estacion Llano.
Mr. Nathan Eric Fier CPG., P.Eng.
